snippet.title: RTRVR 2.0: This is THE BEST AI AGENT YET! Can do ANYTHING from ONE PROMPT!
snippet.description:
Visit RTRVR: https://www.rtrvr.ai/
Chrome Extension Link: https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/rtrvrai-ai-web-agent/jldogdgepmcedfdhgnmclgemehfhpomg
Product Hunt Launch Link: https://www.producthunt.com/products/rtrvr-ai?launch=rtrvr-ai-cloud-api-mcp


In this video, I walk you through the massive version 2.0 update for the RTRVR AI agent. It has evolved from a simple browser extension into a full-blown infrastructure tool for AI automation. I'll show you how it now turns your browser into a MCP Server, runs code securely without external costs, and scales your web scraping tasks to the cloud with a single click.

--
Key Takeaways:

üöÄ RTRVR v2.0 has evolved into a complete infrastructure tool for AI automation.
üåê Your browser can now act as a MCP Server, connecting directly with tools like Claude Code.
‚òÅÔ∏è The new Hybrid Cloud Scaling allows you to scale scraping tasks from your laptop to thousands of cloud browsers.
üß† The refined "Teach a Trick" feature learns your specific workflows just by watching you perform them once.
üì± WhatsApp integration enables you to trigger complex web automations and get answers directly on your phone.
üí∏ A generous free tier is available so you can test these enterprise-level features immediately.
